channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge orders Tennessee to turn off inmate's heart-regulating implanted device at execution

item.description: The EPA's Office of Research and Development has more than 1,500 employees, including scientists and researchers, dispersed across the U.S.

item.title: CBS News poll: Most Americans favor U.S. returning to moon, going to Mars
item.description: Many think the space program adds to feelings of national pride and patriotism, a CBS News poll shows.

item.title: Training facility blast kills 3 LA deputies in one of sheriff’s department’s worst losses of life
item.description: An explosion at a Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department training facility killed three veteran deputies from the arson and explosives unit.

item.title: Tech company launches investigation into Coldplay 'kiss cam' moment
item.description: A man and woman at a Coldplay concert in Boston ducked when shown on the Jumbotron.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs first major federal cryptocurrency bill into law
item.description: The bill outlines regulations aimed at making a specific kind of digital currency called stablecoins more accessible and mainstream.
